Description: On I-664 in the City of Suffolk, at Monitor Merrimac Memorial Bridge Tunnel North, motorists can expect potential delays due to a bridge/tunnel stoppage. All north lanes are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Bridge/Tunnel Stoppage

Description: On BUS US-460 in the County of Giles, in the vicinity of Rt. 9849E/W (Giles County), motorists can expect delays due to an incident. The west left shoulder and left lane are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Other Traffic

Description: On I-81 at mile marker 181 in the County of Rockbridge, motorists can expect delays due to a tractor trailer crash. The north left shoulder and left lane are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Tractor Trailer Crash

Description: On I-264 at mile marker 22.3 in the City of Virginia Beach, near First Colonial Road, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled vehicle. The east right shoulder is closed.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Disabled Vehicle

Description: On I-395 at mile marker 5.8 in the City of Alexandria, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled vehicle. The south right shoulder is closed.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Disabled Vehicle
